name: Silicon Design System
description:
This is Silicon!


Just like how all modern electronics are made possible though the element silicon, all modern interfaces should start with Silicon Design System! This design system was developed and is currently maintained by the IT Development department of COMPFEST, the largest student-held yearly computer science event in Indonesia.


The goal of Silicon was to create a modern design system that teams could easily use to create beautiful interfaces and even interactive prototypes. Silicon was designed with developers in mind and is meant to be sustainable, reusable, and flexible. Using all the sophisticated features Figma has to offer, Silicon Design System offers a complete design system to support end-to-end user interface design while keeping the user experience in mind


See why Silicon is the most comprehensive design system on Figma:

  • Components
  • Styles
  • Variants + Toggleable properties
  • Auto layout
  • Interactive components
  • Responsive
  • Smart animations + custom easings
  • Micro interactions
  • Developer friendly
  • Frequent updates
  • High performance
  • Usability tested
  • + many more!


Try Silicon Design System now!

V 1.0 (3/6/2022)

  • Initial release


V 1.0.1 (3/7/2022)

  • Cleaned up some stray components to corresponding pages
  • Added Silicon link to footer
  • Enlarged size of desktop variant of Tip Card
  • Removed leftover styles
  • Fixed some typos


V 1.0.2 (3/12/2022)

  • Fixed some issues with disappearing icons in interactive components
  • Removed unused components
  • Fixed some typos
